description.value:
This cloak is deep green with a voluminous hood, embroidered with gold trim and symbols significant in elven culture. The cloak allows you to cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ghost Sound]{Ghost Sound} cantrip as an arcane innate spell.

When you adjust the cloak's clasp (an Interact action), the cloak transforms to match the environment around you and muffles your sounds, granting you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Effect: Cloak of Elvenkind (Greater)]{Effect: Cloak of Elvenkind (Greater)}

Activate D Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You draw the hood up and gain the effects of a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Invisibility]{Invisibility}, with the spell's normal duration or until you pull the hood back down, whichever comes first.

If you're also wearing @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Boots of Elvenkind]{Boots of Elvenkind}, you can activate this ability twice per day, and it allows you to Sneak in forest environments even when creatures are currently observing you.
